Love the quality and ease of use EXCEPT I would like to have the QR code be able to link to a video of a picture reel. I though this was possible but could not make it work, even with the pompt customer support you provide.

I made personalize photo blankets for myself, and each of my sisters, nieces, nephews, & great nieces and nephews- all in memory of my parents who passed away recently. They are beautiful; and I am SO happy with the finished products. I can’t wait for my family to open them on Christmas Day!

Review.Titre: The cards arrived quickly and they…
Review.Contenu: The cards arrived quickly and they looked amazing! It was very easy to use and I loved the quality of the cards compared to other companies I have used in the past!

I was hoping to find the time to make our graduate a t-shirt blanket. I was unable to complete the project before graduation.  Thankfully I didn’t start the project before I started working with Forever!  We made her a t-shirt blanket with Forever. We both feel this blanket is probably better than I would have made and it is actually a completed piece!  It was worth the money for the time saving and quality of product!

Review.Titre: Solid communication, fast shipping, great service
Review.Contenu: I had many slides after my father passed away; I sorted thru them and purchased a box.  Even though it took me longer, Forever let me know I could still send the original box and they quickly emailed me a new label.  I bundled the slides as instructed and mailed it off.  The company communicated all the way from letting me know they received the box, that the slides were being digitized, to the shipping is the slides.  I purchased a USB from the company and it was loaded perfectly.  In addition, the Forever website holds my slides for 2 months.  I have made several copies of the slides on flash drives to give as Christmas presents.  I’m very happy with the process and end products.

There were issues of not having last years addresses still there. My rep was immediately responsive and helped me get the issue resolved!! The help staff at Forever were very prompt with replies also!This is my second year doing my Christmas Cards and I am totally pleased. LOVE that they print the addresses on the envelope for you!!

A calendar that I had printed wasn’t forever’s normal quality. It had an ink drop appearance on most of its pages. I emailed and was given full credit for a new calendar to be printed. The new calendar looks great! Thank you very much!
EVERY one of my gifts have arrived early, and are beautiful. My family and friends who have received them are loving them!
The Christmas cards I ordered turned out even better than I expected--e.g., the quality of the cardstock is very high; the gold "Merry Christmas" had texture on the card.

We had a family ancestrial photo restored and colorized. It was beautiful! And it was so touching to see my mother, now deceased, back at age 20, with her beautiful brown hair and brown eyes.  That photo was close to 80 years old and was originally black and white. The colorizing really brought everyone to life. Thank you!

Review.Titre: My order was processed in a quick and…
Review.Contenu: My order was processed in a quick and timely manner. There were many great options to choose from. It was easy to see how my picture looked in the different options before I made my decision.
I love the digitization project I invested in. I was unable to view any of my 8mm and VHS tapes. It was such a pleasant surprise to start viewing these forgotten and almost lost memories.

Kathy Winters has been fantastic in aiding me through the process of understanding all of the facets of Forever. I’m excited to get my home movie digitized as the first step and for her assistance in moving forward in using their storage and creating projects! Oh and the forever club is a great way to get things started.

Review.Titre: The BEST solution to photo/video digitization and organization!
Review.Contenu: I have been extremely happy with the digitization service; I've had over 20 orders processed over the past few years. All of my old videos and faded pictures have come back to life! In addition, I love the privacy and permanence of the cloud storage and the organizing features are user friendly and make it easy to find anything with the click of button! I would recommend FOREVER to everyone because everyone needs their services.

Review.Titre: So very easy to order and if ever I…
Review.Contenu: So very easy to order and if ever I have a question, Lisa Webster, my awesome ambassador, is right there to help me!

Review.Titre: FOREVER Support is always so helpful
Review.Contenu: FOREVER Support is always so helpful. And if the rep doesn't know how to resolve my problem (usually not the case), he or she either finds out for me or refers me to someone who can.

The quality of the items if on the top of the list.As a Canadian, it gets a bit harder with the exchange but when I know my gifts are unique and no one else has the same item, it becomes very special to me.They also do their very best to get it to me in an best way possible. I did order my last gift a day after the deadline, but is is already on its way. Beautiful
Products came within a short time.  The canvases look great!!  I would recommend this product to others.  Thank you for caring about my memories!

Review.Titre: I very much liked the quality of my…
Review.Contenu: I very much liked the quality of my books and that they came sooner than expected. I was worried that they would not get here in time for Christmas gifting, but you came through. Very much appreciated.

Review.Titre: Forever is so easy to use
Review.Contenu: Forever is so easy to use:  Here are my reasons:1. I have created folders that work for me2. I like the options for photos to put details for the photos if I wish3. I feel good that these pictures will survive if something happens to the originals 4. I can share the folders with different people so we all have access5. I can choose to get a databox to get more photos scanned as needed6. I can purchase more space if I wish.7. There are other services I haven't explored yetThank you to the Forever Team!

Review.Titre: Great service from my Brand Ambassador
Review.Contenu: Great service from my Brand Ambassador, Sharyl Rapavy, and I appreciate Forever's commitment to product quality and customer satisfaction. Thanks!

Review.Titre: Quality of Holiday Cards was Top-Notch
Review.Contenu: In ordering my holiday cards I sought help in how to download my photos and set up my card.  The order was processed quickly, shipped within a few days after ordering, and   I received the order in six days from the shipping date (I live in California).  My cards were beautiful and I know I’ll receive many compliments.  Thank you, Forever.  Everything was perfect!

When I received my ornaments one of them was not printed correctly.  I notified my ambassador and she helped me figure out how to reorder.  I notified Customer Support and within 24 hours they had expedited my reorder so I will receive the ornament before Christmas.  There was no charge for the ornament or shipping.  Thanks so much to my ambassador and Customer Support.
Our cards turned out beautiful.  The paper and style looked great and felt nice too. The program was easy to use to get the right look I was going for.
Sandra, was very helpful in helping me choose the appropriate items.  When one of the pictures was too light, she redid it for free.

The people at your office were very helpful in helping me transfer all my programs and software over to my new computer.I created my new book in record time and am very happy with it.  It arrived in good time for Christmas.
The product I ordered was a 12x12 album. It shipped out quite quickly. It was packaged well. The album was made very well. The binding is solid and the pages are excellent quality.
Love the quality of the calendars that I order every year. They also always arrive in a timely manner.

All the materials needed to send in album pages were in the Digitization Box, along with detailed, step-by-step instructions. Similarly, all was returned in the way I’d packed it originally.I received emails during every step of the process. The estimated finish time was on target.I only wonder why the digitization itself has the pages out of order. I’m glad I had penciled each page’s number on the jeeping. I’ll need that to reassemble the albums efficiently. Those will then guide me to create Forever lay flat albums in Artisan.

Review.Titre: FOREVER hands down has the best client…
Review.Contenu: FOREVER hands down has the best client support team of any company I've interacted with. They handle any question big or small with speed and efficiency!

Review.Titre: The People, The Product & A Plan!
Review.Contenu: Tabitha who came as we struggled in our downsizing with BOXES of VIDEOS and PHOTOS/ALBUMS.  She had a product with a plan and took the time to make it easy for me to see how letting go of all these boxes could be not only freeing but allow the whole family access for years to come.  Now my Father has passed and I am talking this product and plan with my brother!

Review.Titre: I love my forever memory book!
Review.Contenu: I worked with Debbie who was just great.  She was helpful, patient, and explained the process.    The memory book turned out great and I am so excited about sharing it with my family.

Review.Titre: I was easily able to create…personalized Christmas Cards.
Review.Contenu: I was easily able to create personalized Christmas Cards. They were delivered promptly. I received great help from my representative, Amy, who guided the process. I am very pleased.

Review.Titre: My order was processed very quickly and…
Review.Contenu: My order was processed very quickly and delivered with no damage. It even arrived 1 week early.

My Creative Memories coach, Brandi Koehm, spent alot of time with me to help find a Christmas card that would accommodate the unusual size picture I had. The printing came out beautifully and I received the cards today.
I ordered a metal print and it came out beautiful.  The colors were vibrant and print quality excellent.

Review.Titre: I am so lucky to have a great Ambassador !
Review.Contenu: I just ordered the video streaming for life. My ambassador, Ann Ozdoba, is so thoughtful in letting me know when I should take advantage of good opportunities and she is so very helpful walking me through everything I have to do. I haven’t used the streaming yet, but I look forward to having it. Thanks, Ann!
The books, mugs, calendars, cards look wonderful. They have all arrived - last two items arrived today- 17 days before Christmas.

Review.Titre: I wish there was more help with coupon…
Review.Contenu: I wish there was more help with coupon codes. I am a founding Forever club member and love how that is automatically added but I recently bought a 199 page album and got 50% off yet I didn’t realize there was a free shipping code. Upset about that.I raised this to five stars when Forever gave me free shipping. Excellent customer service!

Review.Titre: I ordered with Forever Lorrie Curley…
Review.Contenu: I ordered with Forever Lorrie Curley and  I highly recommend this business. Lorrie’s customer service is second to none. She helped put all the details together for my nonprofit holiday card. And the product quality was outstanding, exceeding my expectations. I will definitely order from her again.

Review.Titre: Order every year and never have an…
Review.Contenu: Order every year and never have an issue. Everyone loves their calendars!

Review.Titre: This company has the best support…
Review.Contenu: This company has the best support system!  Whenever I have an issue, the staff are so knowledgeable and quick to help me solve my problem.  I have completed over 50 photobooks with them & they are all beautiful keep-sakes for our family!The quality is top-notch!Thank you so much.

Wow!  I just received my Christmas cards!  I did not choose any options other than pre-addressed envelopes.  They are stunning!  The printing is vivid and bright.  Thank you, forever, for the best cards that any of my family and friends will receive this year!

Review.Titre: Forever always goes above and beyond to…
Review.Contenu: Forever always goes above and beyond to make the experience as best as it possibly can be.  They listen to the customer and their needs and try to make it right whenever they can.  The Best Customer Service ever.  Their products are great and their storage is the best ever because it is permanent and you own it, no other company out there that has this.

Review.Titre: I used Forever to print my 2024…
Review.Contenu: I used Forever to print my 2024 calendars and they were quick to print and ship and the quality is great.

Review.Titre: The products arrived in a timely manner…
Review.Contenu: The products arrived in a timely manner and in very good condition. The quality of the products are excellent and customer service very good

I love the Box Center where I can track my precious memories (slides) during the conversion process.  I love being able to view them and share them.  I love that they are automatically sent to my permanent account.  Knowing that family photos are saved and backed up gives me peace of mind.  Photo memories are priceless!

Review.Titre: The software is simply fabulous and I…
Review.Contenu: The software is simply fabulous and I have been using it for over 20+ years.  The IT support and staff are beyond knowledgeable.  It's scary working on all your life's memories and being able to trust this group to get it done.
Amazing, as usual. My Christmas cards came much sooner than expected and they are beautiful. Such amazing quality.

Review.Titre: I needed a lot of telephone help and…
Review.Contenu: I needed a lot of telephone help and Ariel, Katie, and Laura were absolutely wonderful.I ordered the books on Sat Nov 18th and got a email on Tuesday four days later that the books were on their way. And they are beautiful. Thanks Forever, Ariel, Katie and Laura.
My order turned out great.  It arrived before the scheduled time which I really appreciate.

My family Christmas photo cards are beautiful! The paper quality, even at the standard level, far surpasses other companies’. The envelopes are so thick and slightly textured. Recipients will not be able to see through them. The address printing option is fantastic, and looks so high end.

Review.Titre: Forever, try it, you'll like it!
Review.Contenu: I have been searching for a while for a photo organization system & I think I have found it with Historian 6. The reviews were impressive but it was a personal recommendation from a fellow scrapbooker that tipped the scales. And the fact that my new ambassador turned out to be someone I've known "forever" (pun intended! 😁) helped a lot.She is GREAT as well as the CS technician who helped me with a software problem.  No pressure to purchase FOREVER storage, although I am quite confident I WILL be doing so in the near future. Thanks for being a great company.  👍

Review.Titre: The process was so very easy
Review.Contenu: The process was so very easy.  We can now view all of our old videos and pictures.  This brings back many fond memories for the whole family.

This company is amazing. I have been with them from the very beginning. The Artisan scrapbooking software has almost no limits when creating pages and books. The Historian software is great for manipulating your pictures to improve and achieve the results one is looking for. The quality of their products, such as, mugs, ornaments, scrapbooks, etc. is beyond compare.I used the scrapbooking software long before it was acquired by Forever and have a library of books I have created over the years. While I believe, even in the early years before if was acquired by Forever, that the quality was good, there is no comparison to the quality today. Their service is amazing. When I have had questions, they have helped me work through them with patience. I have used email, the chat room and at times talked directly to the support team. They are very knowledgeable and helpful.Did I mention their online storage? It is worth every penny to buy it. I buy a little at a time. As I create my books, I load only those pictures into my storage. I use the best pictures in my books, they are the one I want to preserve for those that follow me.In my opinion, Forever is the BEST quality product on the market today. I tell everyone about Forever. If you are not utilizing their services, you may just be missing out on something you might find amazing as well.To clarify, I am NOT an ambassador for the company but believe whole heartedly in them.

Every person and every product earns five stars from me. Good advice is dispensed and everyone is knowledgeable, cordial, and helpful. Especially high marks to my ambassador, Lori Funden. She is the connection between the company and me. My understanding of the products and how to manipulate them to my advantage is significantly increased because of her. This ambassador idea you folks came up with is a top notch idea. It adds a lot of value to your product.
We received our order of 2024 calendars within a week of our order and the calendars look great!  Thank you, Forever!  I love using your program.

Review.Titre: They know the answer to all my problems…
Review.Contenu: They know the answer to all my problems and helped me to correct them.
My Ambassador, Mary, was great. She helped me the entire design/layout and everything else related to my project. The result is a beautiful 20 x 30 canvas wrap!

This is the company I use for all my memory preservation !  When doing my grandmother photos some over 100 years old, they were handled with care, took time to answer my questions and now all our family photos are preserved forever.  Now all those photos are easy to access for anyone in the family that needs to.   They also do beautiful photo books that are great quality.

I always wanted to display family photos but I never found the appropriate format. Then my neighbor introduced me to the Forever Company. I was impressed after seeing some of the albums that she had expertly and artistically put together for other clients. I trusted her explicitly and she took my photos and visually told a story of our family trip to Maine this past Summer. I still enjoy reliving our trip every time I open the book. I look forward to putting another album together very soon.

Review.Titre: The personal service I receive is HUGE…
Review.Contenu: The personal service I receive is HUGE for my experience. Having a number I can call to talk to a real person will make me keep coming back to FOREVER.

Review.Titre: I enjoy my memories as I download…
Review.Contenu: I enjoy my memories as I download pictures and journal the experiences my pictures tell. The printing and completing my story is your job and it always comes out beyond my expectations.
I have been using Forever for 14 years and love the experience.  I’ve made one or two books every year for my grandsons. They are very fast and have great discounts. A Happy Digital Girl!!
My Forever person, Glynn Banks, is most talented.  She   was creative and helpful in producing our best Christmas card yet.

After completing my project, I had an issue that required the assistance of customer support. I had the most awesome service from Lisa Lewis who answered my call. Not only did she help me, she followed up making sure I was completely satisfied and my self imposed problem was resolved. She is to be highly commended for her efforts.
My creative memories consultant that I’ve known for 20 years told me about forever. It was easy to use an amazingly reasonably priced. I’m happy with it so far.
It was an interesting experience.  Wonderful that my friend, Mary Anne Ladner, walked me through everything.  The resulting album is perfect.

Review.Titre: My representative made for a great…
Review.Contenu: My representative made for a great experience. It was her knowledge, expertise and kind professionalism that drew me to take a look at this. Thank you Kelly!
My order arrived, and the books were stunning!
Shipping timely - was easy to create my projects and shipping took no time to get my items!

Review.Titre: The customer service team is top notch!
Review.Contenu: The customer service team is exceptional. Everyone knows their stuff, no matter who replies to my emails or anyone that answers the phone. The staff is helpful, friendly and patient.

I submitted an order for 3 photo books, one for myself and two to be used for gifts. After I submitted my photo books for production, I noticed a very glaring error and the Help Desk was able to stop the production so that I could fix the problem and then they printed my books correctly. My ambassador, Gail Berzins, jumped into action to help correct the errors to my books. Everyone was invested in me getting a product that I can proudly give as Christmas gifts.

Review.Titre: The entire process from creating my…
Review.Contenu: The entire process from creating my project to receiving in the mail was easy and fast!

Review.Titre: New foil cards gorgeous and easy
Review.Contenu: I have done my holiday cards with FOREVER for many years now. As usual the process was easy and quick. The new foil cards are GORGEOUS and I love being able to change fonts/sizes of text boxes now. A huge bonus is being able to add my recipients mailing info printed on the envelopes. WOW, just amazing! The process was seamless and I know my family and friends will LOVE our cards!

I have been a customer of Forever for awhile now. They have the best customer service I have ever had the pleasure to work with. They are constantly working to improve their products and services. If you want to keep your memories safe from old age as well as unknown people, Forever storage is the way to go. Yes it's costly. But they guarantee their storage for your life time and are constantly updating so that those memories will he accessible in the future.
The communication is excellent, from start to finish, so that you know that your precious materials arrived safely, were handled with care, and that they were returned safely.

I have always had exceptional interaction with Forever support.  They respond in a quick and timely manner and have always followed up to see if I was having any other issues.  They are always very professional and polite.  They are very knowledgeable and if it is something out of their expertise, they are always quick to say it is and they are following up with someone else who does have knowledge regarding that issue.

My wife's anniversary year books were done extremely well. She died in November 2022. I was not aware of their existence until the annual memorial service. I bought 4, one for me and 3 as gifts for family members. Cant wait to the family members reactions.

Review.Titre: I purchased two gift certificates for my wife
Review.Contenu: I purchased two gift certificates for Christmas.  They were easy to find and I could add a special message.  Thank you!

I am a Forever club member and make monthly payments into my account. I had set my daughter up with an account a few years ago and she wanted more storage for all her photos that are automatically uploaded from her phone through the Forever app. I had enough funds accumulated in my account to send her a gift of 25 GB. She is happy to have a safe place to store and view her photos and I like knowing her photos are safe for years to come. Great gift for teens!

Review.Titre: They always get me through my problems…
Review.Contenu: They always get me through my problems and explain step by step what I (not too computer smart) need to do. That was over Thanksgiving Holiday and it was very prompt.

Review.Titre: Thank you Carol for making my Christmas…
Review.Contenu: Thank you Carol for making my Christmas card order so easy!

The foil cards are beautiful! The soft-touch laminate is definitely a special touch for the cards! Loved having the envelopes pre-printed with return and addressee addresses! To the post office in no time!

Review.Titre: Besides the excellent quality of their…
Review.Contenu: Besides the excellent quality of their products, FOREVER has the best client care team of any company out there!

Review.Titre: Procedures are very clearly laid out…
Review.Contenu: Procedures are very clearly laid out and easy to follow.
